definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Eg. The house on the hill overlooks the village.
sentences.chinese: 從小山上的房子可以俯視村莊。

sentences.english: Mortgaging your house is a big project.
sentences.chinese: 抵押你的房子是一個很大的項目。

sentences.english: You should look at that house before you decide to buy it.
sentences.chinese: 你應該看看那棟房子再決定購買。

sentences.english: My former house has turned into a wreck of tumbled walls.
sentences.chinese: 以前的房子現在已經變成頹垣斷壁了。

sentences.english: Let me get down some information about your apartment first. Whatis yourpropertysaddress?
sentences.chinese: 讓我先記錄一些關於你的房子的資料。

sentences.english: Cheng Xi and Tang Zheng sweet took pictures, and to the two original rented house.
sentences.chinese: 程曦和唐正甜蜜的照了相，又到兩個原來租住的房子。

sentences.english: These houses were put up in 1924.
Which is the house that caught fire last night?
sentences.chinese: 昨晚失火的是那座房子？

sentences.english: The brawl in the street could be heard in the house nearby .
sentences.chinese: 在附近的房子裏都能聽到街上的爭吵聲。

sentences.english: House of Mountaineers stacks the firewood, neat and clean.
sentences.chinese: 山民房子邊堆起的柴薪，整齊而清潔。

sentences.english: Q. Is the house the Cullens live in real?
sentences.chinese: 卡倫一家住的房子是有實體的嗎？

sentences.english: His house was dismantled of all its furniture.
sentences.chinese: 他們房子的傢俱全被拆除了。

sentences.english: Go down Center Street and my house is on your right .
sentences.chinese: 走中心街與我的房子是你的權利。

sentences.english: A rose garden fronts the house.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰園位於房子的前面。

sentences.english: She stood with her back to him, staring at the back wall of his house.
sentences.chinese: 她站在那兒，背對着他，目光注視着房子的後牆。

definition: a building of two or more stories/CL:棟|栋[dong4],幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man
configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
